Mern-BoilerPlate-Blog/backend/config/uti.description: JavaScript utility file, contains helper functions used across the project.

Mern-BoilerPlate-Blog/backend/controller.description: JavaScript file handling authentication logic, processing login, registration, and user sessions.
JavaScript file handling post-related logic, managing creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion of posts.
JavaScript file handling user-related logic, managing user profiles and interactions.

Mern-BoilerPlate-Blog/backend/data/sampl.description: JSON file containing sample data for posts, used for testing and development purposes.

Mern-BoilerPlate-Blog/backend/data/scrip.description: JavaScript file, likely part of the application logic, used for data processing or other operations.

JavaScript file defining error-handling middleware, manages and logs errors occurring in the application.
JavaScript file defining post-related middleware, processes requests related to post operations.

Mern-BoilerPlate-Blog/backend/models/Pos.description: JavaScript file defining the Post model, represents the post schema and data structure in the database.

Mern-BoilerPlate-Blog/backend/models/Use.description: JavaScript file defining the User model, represents the user schema and data structure in the database.

Mern-BoilerPlate-Blog/backend/routes/api.description: JavaScript file defining post-related API routes, handles HTTP requests and responses for posts.
JavaScript file defining user-related API routes, handles HTTP requests and responses for users.

JavaScript file defining the Home component, displays the homepage of the application.
JavaScript file defining the Post component, displays individual post details.
JavaScript file defining the UserProfile component, displays user profile information.
